title: Maximum Sum Subarray of Size K
algorithmDescription: Find maximum sum of contiguous subarray of size k using sliding window
detailedDescription: Find maximum sum of any contiguous subarray of size k. Input: First line has n and k. Second line has n integers. Output: Maximum sum of subarray of size k. Use sliding window technique to achieve O(n) time complexity.
hints: Calculate sum of first k elements
Slide window: subtract leftmost, add new rightmost
No need to recalculate entire window sum
solutionApproach: Calculate sum of first k elements. Slide window from index k to n: subtract arr[i-k], add arr[i], update max. This gives O(n) time by reusing previous sum.
testCaseCriteria: Must achieve O(n) time complexity. Should handle negative numbers, k=1, k=n cases.
